section.title: Disable PAM Console Library
section.para:
Disables PAM from granting sole access to administrative privileges to the first user who logs into the console. The PAM Console library gives users (at the physical console) capabilities that they would not otherwise have, and removes those capabilities when the users are no longer logged in at the console. It provides two main types of capabilities: file permissions and authentication. PAM
console
This module affects the ability for non-privileged users to reboot and perform power-management functions from the console. See pam_console(8) for more information. pam_console
